snippet.title: Mars Tactics - Official TactiCon 2023 Trailer
snippet.description:
Get a good look at sci-fi strategy game, Mars Tactics, in this new trailer revealed at TactiCon 2023. Here's some pre-alpha gameplay from the upcoming turn-based tactical title set on Mars. Lead either the Labor or Capital faction into battle and manage your resources and economy as you work your way across the surface of the red planet.

Mars Tactics has a planned release window of 2023. You can check out the Mars Tactics demo on Steam now.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #MarsTactics
